mapper.insert: insert into t_board (title, ctnt, writer) values (#{title},#{ctnt},#{writer})
mapper.select: select iboard,title,ctnt,writer,created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt from t_board
select iboard,title,ctnt,writer,created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt from t_board where iboard = #{iboard}
